description:
Svelte 5 has been released, marking what the team behind the web framework describes as the “most significant release in the project’s history” and follows 18 months of intensive development. The latest iteration of the web framework arrives as a ground-up rewrite, promising improved performance, reduced bundle sizes, and enhanced reliability. Despite these substantial changes,... Read more »

The post Web framework Svelte delivers ‘most significant release’ yet appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Web framework Svelte delivers ‘most significant release’ yet
